long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse Chrome in Destiny 2’s Earth live wallpapers, with a search bar and quick-access icons for a legendary browsing experience.

Explore the vast world of Destiny 2 with the Earth in Destiny 2 Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Each new tab opens to breathtaking views of Earth, as seen through the eyes of Guardians, capturing the mystique, beauty, and haunting calm of a world under siege. These live wallpapers bring the magic of Destiny 2 to life, perfect for fans who want to experience the game’s rich atmosphere while browsing.

The extension also offers a built-in Google search bar for quick, convenient browsing and customizable quick-access icons to your favorite sites, allowing you to stay connected while reveling in Destiny’s iconic landscapes.

Ideal for Destiny 2 fans and lovers of sci-fi worlds, the Earth in Destiny 2 Live Wallpaper extension transforms your browsing into a cinematic experience. Open each new tab to step into the universe of Destiny 2, where Earth stands as a beacon of hope and resilience amid the stars.
